data.text: @ZacharyToliver @mattlargey Ah - I see your in Austin like me ... where no one is wearing masks.

@ZacharyToliver @mattlargey And even N95/KN95/FFP2's are rarely fitted correctly - so they also become useless. So - I would say my original statement is true - most masks are physically useless or due to fitting are functionally useless.

@ZacharyToliver @mattlargey I think the non-mask masks dont work - N95 or KN95 or FFP2's do - but you rarely see anyone with a "good" mask - it all these cloth masks which are about as useful as a chocolate teapot.
@JonInternet @mattlargey It didn't seem like we were in agreement, because the way you spoke about masks made it seem like they don't work at all. That's what I disagree with.
@ZacharyToliver @mattlargey then it seems we are in agreement - in which case Im surprised you bothered to comment on my post

@JonInternet @mattlargey You really don't get it. I never said I'm going to wear a mask everywhere. I'm just stating that not wearing a mask increases the chances of transmission, because you said they don't work. That has nothing to do with my preference on wearing a mask or not.

@JonInternet @mattlargey Can you read? I didn't say they stop transmission. I said they reduce the chances. No one is forcing you to wear a mask. I'm just saying that you are increasing the chances of contracting and spreading. Whether you care or not is up to you.

@ZacharyToliver @mattlargey Are you going to mask forever ? If omicron is less severe than flu are you going mask against flu .. at some point we need to get back to life … 3 freekin shots plus omicron .. I was a very pro masker .. not now .. time to live again
@ZacharyToliver @mattlargey You don’t … so if they don’t prevent catching disease and one is triple vaccinated the. Why bother ? .. masks stop you spreading it .. not catching it
